name: 1500, or would Leonardo approve this message?
description: "the world’s most expensive, missing-in-action painting" according to Kenny Schachter (10/6/19). In Vasari's words: "da Vinci, in whom, besides a beauty of person never sufficiently admired and a wonderful grace in all his actions, there was such a power of intellect that whatever he turned his mind to he made himself master of with ease."  Image reinterpreted through layers of digital hand and machine tracing, drawing and collage. 8000x8192px JPG. Bernabee @bjkbrocker
